itemDescription: Spicer, Eulalie Evan (1906–1997), lawyer and legal aid administrator

wikipedia_page.main: Eulalie Spicer (20 April 1906 – 29 March 1997) was a British lawyer and legal aid administrator. She was a leading divorce lawyer and liked to be called "Miss Spencer" or "EES". She wore her hair very short, wore a suit, used a cigarette holder, travelled around on a scooter and enjoyed shooting revolvers.
